column5: The goal of the programme is to prepare marketing and international commerce specialists of high qualification who, having mastered the most recent marketing theories and methods, are able to analyze tendencies and changes in the market independently, follow and evaluate scientific innovations, as well as apply the knowledge for the development of organization marketing management.Masters in Marketing degree can help students develop and update the advanced knowledge, skills and strategic and industry awareness they need to take the next step towards a future marketing career.
